memberdef.name: GET_FLOAT
memberdef.initializer: { \ SG::AuxElement::Accessor<float> floatAcc(name); \ if(!floatAcc.isAvailable(*m_b)) return -9999999.; \ return floatAcc(*m_b); \ }

memberdef.name: SET_FLOAT
memberdef.initializer: { \ SG::AuxElement::Decorator<float> floatDec(name); \ floatDec(*m_b) = val; \ return true; \ }
